name: CAD Nepal
overview:
CAD Nepal is a multi-service providing Information Technology consulting organization. CAD Nepal provides high quality, time bound and cost effective back office outsourcing services through our offshore facilities in Nepal. CAD Nepal is a privately owned and has been providing services like Information Technology Outsourcing (ITO) and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) since 1998.

CAD Nepal transforms highly skilled personnel into IT solutions that are both cost effective and of high quality. The company offer services for customized Application Development, industry web solutions, Multimedia & Graphics designing, GIS & CAD Development, Data processing, Information security Audits, Penetration Testing and Vulnerability Scanning services worldwide.
